Package org.neo4j.kernel.recovery

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LogTailScannerMonitor  
    RecoveryApplier
    Recovery transaction applier that will apply all recovered transaction to underlying store.
    RecoveryMonitor  
    RecoveryService  
    RecoveryStartInformationProvider.Monitor  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CorruptedLogsTruncator
    Transaction log truncator used during recovery to truncate all the logs after some specified position, that recovery treats as corrupted or non-readable.
    DefaultRecoveryService  
    DefaultRecoveryService.RecoveryVisitor  
    LoggingLogTailScannerMonitor  
    Recovery
    Utility class to perform store recovery or check is recovery is required.
    Recovery.MissingTransactionLogsCheck  
    Recovery.NonListenableMonitors  
    RecoveryFacade  
    RecoveryHelpers  
    RecoveryRequiredChecker
    Utility that can determine if a given store will need recovery.
    RecoveryStartInformation  
    RecoveryStartInformationProvider
    Utility class to find the log position to start recovery from
    RecoveryStartupChecker  
    RecoveryStartupChecker.NeverCanceledChecker  
    TransactionLogsRecovery
    This is the process of doing a recovery on the transaction log and store, and is executed at startup of Database.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    RecoveryExtension
    Annotation to mark extension that want to participate in database recovery.
